entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Uri does not allow * (or other sub-delims) in hostname #64707
  • Copy propagation needs to propagate variables, not values #64700
    7.0.0
  • ContentRootPath and appsettings.json behavior differences between worker and console app #64698
  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient cannot handle unencoded parentheses characters '(' or ')' in Header. #64694
  • TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId returning false for an IANA timezone on App Service azure #64693
  • Question: difference between X509RevocationMode.Offline and X509RevocationMode.Online #64689
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add easyway possibility to replace a specific Implementation in ServiceCollection #64680
  • Make working with JSON and HTTP Requests easier #64676
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failed #64675
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Net.Tests.ServicePointManagerTest.FindServicePoint_Collectible failed. #64674
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Net.Ping.Functional.Tests failed #64673
  • Difference in attribute handling by System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Validator.TryValidateObject between .net core 3.1 and .net 6 #64672
  • Managed debugger does not hit breakpoints on callbacks from native thread #64668
  • Logging Source Generator fails to detect event name uniqueness within a class scope #64667
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `out` parameter modifier is present #64665
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use emscripten workload packs instead of a local provisioned emsdk to build the runtime #64660
  • Dynamic PGO work planned for .NET 7 #64659
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.CompareExchange for byte/short/sbyte/ushort #64658
  • AccessViolationException in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_FromString<MyEventsListerViewModel>.Jil_ benchmark #64657
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-runtime-.NET 5, runtime #runtime-101517-.NET5 #57251
    5.0.x
  • [wasm] debuger test failures on CI #62964
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Update two debugger tests, as they are invalid now #63560
  • debuggertests.harnesstests.debuggertests.harnesstests.exceptionthrown #64483
  • [API Proposal]: DbDataReader.GetDateOnly and DbDataReader.GetTimeOnly #62135
  • Continue evolving System.Data and the database providers #48253
    6.0.0
  • Race condition in MemoryCache will crash the process #61032
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotation for ValidationAttribute.IsValid overload #63147
  • Visual Studio 2022 : Extension code C# - JsonContent.CreateContent no longer works #63063
    7.0.0
  • VS 2022 preview 2.1: Blazor WebAssembly debugging can't move current cursor when paused #64475
  • Prevent placing ref fields on non-pointer boundaries #64520
    7.0.0
  • How to detect or prevent HTTPS endpoint fallback to Http #64029
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `in` parameter modifier is present #62644
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS0246 and CS0265 errors if type for generic constraint is in a different namespace #58550
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails ungracefully with overloaded methods #61814
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move explicit coverage entry points into separate public classes #64708
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Clean up remaining tests under JIT/Methodical using Environment.Exit #64706
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64705
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Fixes bad log method generation in certain cases. #64704
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Use ordinal comparison for known header values #64702
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use SSA def VNs to determine legality of copy propagation (instead of tree VNs) #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix racy page reload test #64695
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update Maui Workload Install Process for Perf #64692
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix test build command in docs/workflow/building/coreclr/nativeaot.md #64690
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64687
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • Compile coreclr\dlls folder with PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT #64684
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #55822 Disable CanRecurseFrom root for Android #64682
    area-System.IO
  • Add easyway possibility to replace a specific Implementation in ServiceCollection #64681
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #64679
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consume renamed TargetFramework package #64670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Logging Source Generator - Adds support to `@` signed prefixed parameters #64663
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow ConfigBinder to bind arrays to Singular elements #64656
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Allow use of overloaded methods when using LoggerMessage #64573
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64593
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update windows helix queues #64699
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-maui] Bump emsdk version #64691
    area-Build-mono
  • Add notes about ignored checks to superpmi-asmdiffs and enterprise-linux pipelines #64685
    area-Infrastructure
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Revert emscripten bump temporarily #64664
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some flaky tests #64652
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete InternalModuleBuilder and InternalAssemblyBuilder #64662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Avoid downcasting NewSize #64661
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Logging Source Generator - Remove extra blank space with generated code #64666
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Disable Vector256 tests which are timing out #64653
  • Fix some nullability warnings in NativeAOT CoreLib #64404
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests for `ref` field overlap with OBJECTREF and non-aligned `ref` fields. #64643
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change message for uncompilable methods #64669
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable a few ECKeyFileTests on Android 31 and later #64533
    area-System.Security
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Ignore exit code returned from the merged wrappers #64651
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Writeup on OSR Details and Debugging #64428
  • Remove unused variable, fix typos #64542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger initialization #64523
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Enable WasmTemplateTests on CI #64589
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Emscripten 2.0.34 bump #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Handle ((IAsyncResult)task).AsyncWaitHandle.Dispose better in task completion #64627
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution #54063
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Pass IV through cipher resets for OpenSSL and Android #64641
    area-System.Security
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #64644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Throw PNSE if insufficient privileges when custom Ping payload was specified #64625
    area-System.Net
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    Servicing-consider, area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
